Crime Prevention Task Force

Welcome to our clearinghouse of information about preventing crime within Lancaster County, Pennsylvania.
 
The focus of this website is to increase awareness of Crime Prevention services available throughout Lancaster County. Feel free to explore the following links and contact the listed service provider for more details. 
 

Learn More...

Learn more about what we do and the resources available to you: 

  • About us
  • Additional Links
  • Training & Events

Dennis Stuckey
Joshua Parsons
Craig Lehman

Craig Stedman
